Efendi Nahi.verse 83:1: Mjer për ata që kur masin – mungojnë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:2: të cilët e marrin masën e plotë kur është e marrin vetveten,
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:3: e, kur t’iu masin të tjerëve me litër ose me kandar – ju pakësojnë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:4: A nuk mendojnë ata se do të ringjallen
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:5: në një Ditë të madhe (të Kijametit),
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:6: atë Ditë kur njerëzit do të dalin para Zotit të gjithësisë!
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:7: Po, po, me të vërtetë, Libri i mëkatarëve është në Sixh-xhin,
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:8: e, ata e di ti se ç’është Sixh-xhin?
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:11: që kanë mohuar Ditën e Kijametit –
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:12: e atë, e mohon vetëm kundërvajtësi, mëkatari (i madh),
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:13: i cili, kur i janë lexuar ajetet Tona, ka thënë: “Trillime të popujve të lashtë!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:14: E, nuk është ashtu! Por, veprat e tyre (të këqia) i kanë ndryshkur zemrat e tyre (i kanë nxirë).
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:15: Jo, jo, atë ditë, me të vërtetë, ata do të jenë të penguar që ta shohin Zotin e tyre,
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:16: pastaj, me siguri, do të hyjnë në skëterrë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:17: e do t’ju thuhet (nga engjëjt e skëterrës): “Qe, kjo është ajo që e keni mohuar!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:18: Po, po, me të vërtetë, Libri i të ndershmëve është në Il-lijjin,
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:19: E, a e di ti se ç’është Il-lijjin?
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:21: që e dëshmojnë të afërmit (engjëjt) e Perëndisë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:22: Me të vërtetë, të mirët (njerëz) do të gjenden në xhennet,
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:23: e nga divanet – kanapet do të shikojnë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:24: në fytyrat e tyre do të njohësh freskinë e begative,
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:25: atyre do t’u jepet të pinë nga pijet e mbyllura (të ruajtura),
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:26: vula e të cilave është misk (parfem), - dhe për këtë, le të bëjnë gara garuesit! –
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:27: (pija) do të jetë e përzier me ujin e Tesnimit,
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:28: nga burimi i të cilit do të pinë të afërmit e Perëndisë (të mirët).
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:29: Me të vërtetë, mëkatarët qeshnin (në jetën e kësaj bote), me ata që besonin;
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:30: kur kalonin pranë tyre, njëri-tjetrit ia bënin me sy,
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:31: e kur ktheheshin te familjet e tyre, ata argëtoheshin në formë tallëse (me besimtarët);
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:32: ata (mëkatarët), kur i shihnin (besimtarët), thonin: “Këta, me të vërtetë, janë të humbur”, -
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:33: e, ata nuk janë dërguar për kujdestarë të tyre (besimtarëve).
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:34: Sot, ata që kanë besuar, do t’i përqeshin mohuesit,
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:35: e, nga divanet (kanapet) do të shikojnë
Efendi Nahi.verse 83:36: a janë shpërblyer meritueshëm mohuesit, për veprat që kanë punuar?! (Po).

null.verse 83:1: Vay halına çəkidə və ölçüdə aldadanların!
null.verse 83:2: O kəslər ki, özlərini insanlardan (bir şey) aldıqları zaman onu tam ölçüb alar,
null.verse 83:3: Onlar üçün ölçdükdə və ya çəkdikdə isə (onu) əskildərlər.
null.verse 83:4: Məgər onlar (öləndən sonra) diriləcəklərini düşünmürlərmi?!
null.verse 83:6: O gün bütün insanlar (haqq-hesab üçün) aləmlərin Rəbbinin (Allahın) hüzurunda duracaqlar!
null.verse 83:7: Xeyr! Şübhəsiz ki, pis əməllərə uyanların (kafirlərin) əməl dəftəri (şeytanların əməllərinin yazıldığı və ya Cəhənnəmin ən alt təbəqəsi olan) Siccindədir!
null.verse 83:8: Sən nə bilirsən (haradan bilirsən) ki, Siccin nədir?! (Və ya: Siccin nədir, bilirsənmi?)
null.verse 83:10: O gün vay halına yalan sayanların!
null.verse 83:11: O kəslər ki, haqq-hesab gününü yalan sayarlar.
null.verse 83:12: Bunu isə ancaq həddini aşan, günaha batan yalan sayar.
null.verse 83:13: Ayələrimiz ona oxunduğu zaman: "(Bunlar) qədimlərin əfsanələridir (uydurmalarıdır!)" - deyər.
null.verse 83:14: Xeyr (belə deyildir).
null.verse 83:15: Xeyr, o gün Rəbbinin mərhəmətindən məhrum olacaqlar!
null.verse 83:16: Sonra Cəhənnəmə varid qalacaqlar.
null.verse 83:17: Sonra da onlara: "Bu sizin (dünyada) yalan saydığınız (Cəhənnəmdir)!" deyiləcəkdir.
null.verse 83:18: Xeyr! (Mö'minlərlə kafirlər eyni ola bilməzlər).
null.verse 83:19: Sən nə bilirsən (haradan bilirsən) ki, İlliyyun nədir?!
null.verse 83:21: Onu ancaq (Allaha) yaxın olan mələklər görə bilər!
null.verse 83:22: Həqiqətən, yaxşı əməl və itaət sahibi olan mö'minlər Nəim cənnətlərində olacaqlar.
null.verse 83:23: Onlar taxtlar üstündə (əyləşib Allahın hazır etdiyi ne'mətlərə) tamaşa edəcəklər.
null.verse 83:24: Sən (ey Peyğəmbər!) onların üzlərində cənnət sevinci görəcəksən!
null.verse 83:25: Onlara (gözəl ətirli, təmiz) möhürlü (qablarda olan) şərab (rəhiq) içirdiləcəkdir.
null.verse 83:26: Onun (içində rəhiq olan qabın) möhürü müşkdür.
null.verse 83:27: Ona təsnim (suyu) qatılmışdır.
null.verse 83:28: O (təsnim) elə bir çeşmədir ki, ondan (təmiz halda) yalnız (Allaha) yaxın olanlar içər (qalanlara isə o rəhiq şərabına qatılıb verirlər).
null.verse 83:29: Həqiqətən, günahkarlar iman gətirmiş kimsələrə (dünyada) gülürdülər.
null.verse 83:30: (Mö'minlərin) yanlarından keçərkən (onları dolamaq məqsədilə) bir-birinə qaş-göz edirdilər.
null.verse 83:31: Ailələrinin (yaxın adamlarının) yanına qayıtdıqda isə (onları doladıqları üçün) kefləri kök qayıdırdılar.
null.verse 83:32: Onlar (mö'minləri) gördükdə: "Doğrusu, bunlar (haqq yoldan) azanlardır!" - deyirdilər.
null.verse 83:33: Halbuki onlara (mö'minlərə) nəzarətçi göndərilməmişdir.
null.verse 83:34: Bu gün isə mö'minlər kafirlərə güləcəklər.
null.verse 83:35: Onlar taxtlar üstündə (əyləşib) baxacaqlar (ki, görsünlər).
null.verse 83:36: Kafirlər öz əməllərinin cəzasını aldılarmı?! (Əlbəttə, aldılar!)

null.verse 83:1: Teško onima koji pri mjerenju zakidaju,
null.verse 83:2: koji punu mjeru uzimaju kada od drugih kupuju,
null.verse 83:3: a kada drugima mjere na litar ili na kantar - zakidaju.
null.verse 83:4: Kako ne pomisle da će oživljeni biti
null.verse 83:6: na Dan kada će se ljudi zbog Gospodara svjetova dići!
null.verse 83:7: Uistinu! Knjiga grješnika je u Sidždžinu,
null.verse 83:8: a znaš li ti šta je Sidždžin?
null.verse 83:10: Teško toga dana onima koji su poricali -
null.verse 83:11: koji su onaj svijet poricali -
null.verse 83:12: a njega može poricati samo prijestupnik, grješnik,
null.verse 83:13: koji je, kada su mu ajeti naši kazivani, govorio: "Izmišljotine naroda drevnih!"
null.verse 83:14: A nije tako! Ono što su radili prekrilo je srca njihova,
null.verse 83:15: uistinu, oni će toga dana od milosti Gospodara svoga zakonjeni biti,
null.verse 83:16: zatim će, sigurno, u oganj ući,
null.verse 83:17: pa će im se reći: "Eto, to je ono što ste poricali!"
null.verse 83:18: Uistinu! Knjiga čestitih je u Ilijjunu,
null.verse 83:19: a znaš li ti šta je Ilijjun?
null.verse 83:21: nad njom bdiju oni Allahu bliski.
null.verse 83:22: Dobri će, zaista, u nasladama boraviti.
null.verse 83:23: sa divana gledati,
null.verse 83:24: na licima njihovim prepoznaćeš radost sretna života,
null.verse 83:25: daće im se pa će piće zapečaćeno piti,
null.verse 83:26: čiji će pečat mošus biti - i neka se za to natječu oni koji se hoće natjecati! -
null.verse 83:27: pomiješano sa vodom iz Tesnima
null.verse 83:28: sa izvora iz kojeg će Allahu bliski piti.
null.verse 83:29: Grješnici se smiju onima koji vjeruju;
null.verse 83:30: kada pored njih prolaze, jedni drugima namiguju,
null.verse 83:31: a kada se porodicama svojim vraćaju, šale zbijajući vraćaju se;
null.verse 83:32: kada ih vide, onda govore: "Ovi su, doista, zalutali!" -
null.verse 83:33: a oni nisu poslani da motre na njih.
null.verse 83:34: Danas će oni koji su vjerovali - nevjernicima se podsmijavati,
null.verse 83:35: sa divana će gledati.
null.verse 83:36: Zar će nevjernici biti drugačije kažnjeni nego prema onome kako su postupali! gledati.

null.verse 83:1: যারা মাপে কম করে, তাদের জন্যে দুর্ভোগ,
null.verse 83:2: যারা লোকের কাছ থেকে যখন মেপে নেয়, তখন পূর্ণ মাত্রায় নেয়
null.verse 83:3: এবং যখন লোকদেরকে মেপে দেয় কিংবা ওজন করে দেয়, তখন কম করে দেয়।
null.verse 83:4: তারা কি চিন্তা করে না যে, তারা পুনরুত্থিত হবে।
null.verse 83:6: যেদিন মানুষ দাঁড়াবে বিশ্ব পালনকর্তার সামনে।
null.verse 83:7: এটা কিছুতেই উচিত নয়, নিশ্চয় পাপাচারীদের আমলনামা সিজ্জীনে আছে।
null.verse 83:8: আপনি জানেন, সিজ্জীন কি?
null.verse 83:10: সেদিন দুর্ভোগ মিথ্যারোপকারীদের,
null.verse 83:11: যারা প্রতিফল দিবসকে মিথ্যারোপ করে।
null.verse 83:12: প্রত্যেক সীমালংঘনকারী পাপিষ্ঠই কেবল একে মিথ্যারোপ করে।
null.verse 83:13: তার কাছে আমার আয়াতসমূহ পাঠ করা হলে সে বলে, পুরাকালের উপকথা।
null.verse 83:14: কখনও না, বরং তারা যা করে, তাই তাদের হৃদয় মরিচা ধরিয়ে দিয়েছে।
null.verse 83:15: কখনও না, তারা সেদিন তাদের পালনকর্তার থেকে পর্দার অন্তরালে থাকবে।
null.verse 83:16: অতঃপর তারা জাহান্নামে প্রবেশ করবে।
null.verse 83:17: এরপর বলা হবে, একেই তো তোমরা মিথ্যারোপ করতে।
null.verse 83:18: কখনও না, নিশ্চয় সৎলোকদের আমলনামা আছে ইল্লিয়্যীনে।
null.verse 83:19: আপনি জানেন ইল্লিয়্যীন কি?
null.verse 83:21: আল্লাহর নৈকট্যপ্রাপ্ত ফেরেশতাগণ একে প্রত্যক্ষ করে।
null.verse 83:22: নিশ্চয় সৎলোকগণ থাকবে পরম আরামে,
null.verse 83:23: সিংহাসনে বসে অবলোকন করবে।
null.verse 83:24: আপনি তাদের মুখমন্ডলে স্বাচ্ছন্দ্যের সজীবতা দেখতে পাবেন।
null.verse 83:25: তাদেরকে মোহর করা বিশুদ্ধ পানীয় পান করানো হবে।
null.verse 83:26: তার মোহর হবে কস্তুরী। এ বিষয়ে প্রতিযোগীদের প্রতিযোগিতা করা উচিত।
null.verse 83:27: তার মিশ্রণ হবে তসনীমের পানি।
null.verse 83:28: এটা একটা ঝরণা, যার পানি পান করবে নৈকট্যশীলগণ।
null.verse 83:29: যারা অপরাধী, তারা বিশ্বাসীদেরকে উপহাস করত।
null.verse 83:30: এবং তারা যখন তাদের কাছ দিয়ে গমন করত তখন পরস্পরে চোখ টিপে ইশারা করত।
null.verse 83:31: তারা যখন তাদের পরিবার-পরিজনের কাছে ফিরত, তখনও হাসাহাসি করে ফিরত।
null.verse 83:32: আর যখন তারা বিশ্বাসীদেরকে দেখত, তখন বলত, নিশ্চয় এরা বিভ্রান্ত।
null.verse 83:33: অথচ তারা বিশ্বাসীদের তত্ত্বাবধায়করূপে প্রেরিত হয়নি।
null.verse 83:34: আজ যারা বিশ্বাসী, তারা কাফেরদেরকে উপহাস করছে।
null.verse 83:35: সিংহাসনে বসে, তাদেরকে অবলোকন করছে,
null.verse 83:36: কাফেররা যা করত, তার প্রতিফল পেয়েছে তো? করছে,

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:2: които щом взимат от хората, изпълват мярката,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:3: а щом им отмерват или им претеглят, причиняват загуба!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:4: Не допускат ли тези, че ще бъдат възкресени
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:6: Деня, в който хората ще застанат пред Господа на световете?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:7: Не! Книгата [за делата] на разпътниците е в Сиджжин.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:8: Но откъде да знаеш ти какво е Сиджжин?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:10: Горко в този Ден за отричащите,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:11: които взимат за лъжа Съдния ден!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:12: Взима го за лъжа само всеки престъпник, грешник.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:13: Когато му четат Нашите знамения, казва: Легенди на предците!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:14: Ала не! Сърцата им с ръжда покрива онова, което са придобили.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:15: Ала не! Тогава не ще бъдат допуснати до своя Господ.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:17: После ще се каже: Това е, което отричахте!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:18: Ала не! Книгата [за делата] на праведниците е в Иллийун.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:19: Но откъде да знаеш ти какво е Иллийун?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:24: Ще узнаеш по лицата им сиянието на блаженството.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:25: Ще им се поднесе запечатано, пребистро питие.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:26: Дори утайката му е като [ухание на] мускус.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:29: Онези, които престъпиха, се смееха на онези, които повярваха.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:30: И когато минаваха край тях, си смигваха.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:31: И когато се завръщаха при своите хора, те се завръщаха развеселени.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:32: И когато ги виждаха, казваха: Тези са заблудени.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:33: А те не бяха пратени за техни надзиратели.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:34: Но в този Ден вярващите се смеят на неверниците.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 83:36: Не се ли въздаде на неверниците за онова, което са вършили? гледат.

null.verse 83:1: 傷哉！稱量不公的人們。
null.verse 83:2: 當他們從別人稱量進來的時候，他們稱量得很充足；
null.verse 83:3: 當他們量給別人或稱給別人的時候，他們不稱足不量足。
null.verse 83:4: 難道他們不信自己將復活，
null.verse 83:6: 在那日，人們將為全世界的主而起立。
null.verse 83:7: 絕不然，惡人們的紀錄，將在一本惡行簿中。
null.verse 83:8: 你怎能知道惡行簿是什麼？
null.verse 83:10: 在那日，傷哉否認的人們——
null.verse 83:11: 否認報應日的人們！
null.verse 83:12: 只有每個過分的犯罪的人，否認它。
null.verse 83:13: 當別人對他宣讀我的跡象的時候，他說：「這是古人的故事。」
null.verse 83:14: 絕不然，但他們所犯的罪惡，已像銹樣蒙敝他們的心。
null.verse 83:15: 真的，在那日，他們必受阻攔，不得覲見他們的主。
null.verse 83:16: 然後，他們必墮入烈火之中。
null.verse 83:17: 然後，或者將對他們說：「這就是你們所否認的。」
null.verse 83:18: 真的，善人們的記錄，確在善行簿中。
null.verse 83:19: 你怎能知道善行簿是什麼？
null.verse 83:21: 真主所親近的天神們將作証它。
null.verse 83:22: 善人們必在恩澤中，
null.verse 83:23: 靠在床上注視著，
null.verse 83:24: 你能在他們的面目上認識恩澤的光華。
null.verse 83:25: 他們將飲封存的天醇，
null.verse 83:26: 封瓶口的，是麝香。教貪愛這種幸福的人們，爭先為善吧！
null.verse 83:27: 天醇的混合物，是由太斯尼姆來的，
null.verse 83:28: 那是一洞泉水，真主所親近的人將飲它。
null.verse 83:29: 犯罪的人們常常嘲笑信士們，
null.verse 83:30: 當信士們從他們的面前走過的時候，他們以目互相示意；
null.verse 83:31: 當他們回家的時候，洋洋得意地回去；
null.verse 83:32: 當他們遇見信士們的時候，他們說：「這等人確是迷誤的。」
null.verse 83:33: 他們沒有被派去監視信士們。
null.verse 83:34: 故今日信士們，嘲笑不信道的人們，
null.verse 83:35: 他們靠在床上注視著，
null.verse 83:36: 「不信道的人們已獲得他們的行為的報酬了嗎？」 他們靠在床上注視著，

null.verse 83:1: Běda těm, kdo míru zkracují,
null.verse 83:2: kteří když jim je měřeno plnou míru od lidí žádají,
null.verse 83:3: však když pro druhé měří či váží, ztrátu jim působí!
null.verse 83:4: Což si myslí, že nebudou vzkříšeni
null.verse 83:6: pro den, kdy lidé před Pána vesmíru předstoupí?
null.verse 83:7: Však pozor, vždyť věru kniha hříšníků je v Sidždžínu!
null.verse 83:8: Víš ty vůbec, co je to Sidždžín?
null.verse 83:10: Běda v ten den těm, kdož za lež prohlašují
null.verse 83:11: a za výmysl den soudný pokládají!
null.verse 83:12: Nepokládá jej za výmysl nikdo kromě všech protivníků hříšných,
null.verse 83:13: kteří - když jsou jim přednášena Naše znamení - říkají: "To jsou povídačky starých!"
null.verse 83:14: Však pozor! Naopak srdce jejich zrezivěla od toho, co si vysloužila.
null.verse 83:15: Však pozor! Věru že budou v ten den od svého Pána odděleni závěsem
null.verse 83:16: a potom budou hořet v ohni pekelném
null.verse 83:17: a posléze jim bude řečeno: "Hle, zde máte, co nazývali jste výmyslem!"
null.verse 83:18: Však pozor! Vždyť věru kniha zbožných je v ´Illijún!
null.verse 83:19: Víš ty vůbec, co je to ´Illijún?
null.verse 83:21: na vlastní oči ji spatří ten, kdo k Pánu bude přiblížen.
null.verse 83:22: A zbožní vskutku budou ve slastech,
null.verse 83:23: na pohovkách ležíce se budou rozhlížet.
null.verse 83:24: Na jejich tvářích uzříš svěžest slastí,
null.verse 83:25: napájeni budou vínem silným, zapečetěným
null.verse 83:26: z pižma pečetí - o to nechť soutěží ti, kdož soutěží -
null.verse 83:27: s vodou Tasnímu smíseným,
null.verse 83:28: pramene, z něhož pijí jen přiblížení.
null.verse 83:29: Věru že se hříšníci posmívali těm, kdož uvěřili,
null.verse 83:30: a když je míjeli; vzájemně na sebe pomrkávali,
null.verse 83:31: a když se ke svým rodinám vrátili, smích si tropili,
null.verse 83:32: a když je viděli, volali: "Věru jsou to zbloudilí!",
null.verse 83:33: A přec nebyli posláni k věřícím, aby je střežili.
null.verse 83:34: Dnes však se nevěřícím posmívají ti, kdož věřili,
null.verse 83:35: a na pohovkách ležíce se rozhlížejí.
null.verse 83:36: Dostalo se nevěřícím odměny za to, co činili? rozhlížejí.

null.verse 83:1: Wee hen die anderen tekort doen.
null.verse 83:2: Wanneer zij voor zichzelf wegen, nemen zij volle maat;
null.verse 83:3: Indien zij voor anderen uitmeten of afwegen, geven zij minder (dan behoort).
null.verse 83:4: Weten zulke mensen niet dat zij zullen herrijzen
null.verse 83:6: De Dag, waarop de mensheid voor de Heer der Werelden zal staan?
null.verse 83:7: Neen! Het gedenkschrift over de bozen is in Sidjdjien.
null.verse 83:8: En wat weet gij er van wat Sidjdjien is?
null.verse 83:10: Wee, op die Dag de loochenaars,
null.verse 83:11: Die de Dag des Oordeels loochenen.
null.verse 83:12: En niemand behalve de zondige overtreder loochent die (Dag),
null.verse 83:13: Die zegt, als Onze woorden aan hem worden voorgedragen: "Fabelen der ouden.
null.verse 83:14: Neen, maar hetgeen zij plachten te verdienen heeft zich als roest aan hun hart gehecht.
null.verse 83:15: Neen, zij zullen die Dag zeker van hun Heer worden uitgesloten.
null.verse 83:16: Voorwaar, dan zullen zij in de hel branden,
null.verse 83:17: En er zal tot hen worden gezegd: "Dit is hetgeen gij placht te loochenen!"
null.verse 83:18: Neen, het gedenkschrift der deugdzamen is voorzeker in "Illijjien.
null.verse 83:19: En wat weet gij er van wat"Illijjien" is?
null.verse 83:21: De nabij (God) zijnden zullen het zien.
null.verse 83:22: Voorwaar, de deugdzamen onder zegeningen,
null.verse 83:23: Op hoge sofa’s zullen zij elkander aanschouwen,
null.verse 83:24: Gij zult in hun gezicht de glans der gelukzaligheid herkennen.
null.verse 83:25: Hun wordt zuivere verzegelde wijn te drinken gegeven.
null.verse 83:26: Welks zegel muskus is.
null.verse 83:27: En hij zal vermengd worden met water van Tasniem;
null.verse 83:28: Een bron waaruit de nabij (God) zijnden drinken.
null.verse 83:29: Waarlijk, de schuldigen plachten de gelovigen uit te lachen,
null.verse 83:30: En wanneer zij hen voorbijgingen, knipoogden zij tegen elkander.
null.verse 83:31: En wanneer zij tot de hunnen terugkeerden, keerden zij opgetogen terug;
null.verse 83:32: En wanneer zij hen zagen, zeiden zij: "Dit zijn inderdaad de dwalenden.
null.verse 83:33: Maar zij waren niet als bewakers over hen gezonden.
null.verse 83:34: Daarom zullen op deze Dag de gelovigen over de ongelovigen lachen,
null.verse 83:35: Op hoge sofa’s zittende zullen zij aanschouwen;
null.verse 83:36: Voorzeker wordt de ongelovigen vergolden voor hetgeen zij plachten te doen! aanschouwen;

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:2: Those who when they take the measure from mankind demand it full,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:3: But if they measure unto them or weight for them, they cause them loss.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:4: Do such (men) not consider that they will be raised again
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:6: The day when (all) mankind stand before the Lord of the Worlds ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:7: Nay, but the record of the vile is in Sijjin -
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:8: Ah! what will convey unto thee what Sijjin is! -
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:10: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:11: Those who deny the Day of Judgment
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:12: Which none denieth save each criminal transgressor,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:13: Who, when thou readest unto him Our revelations, saith: (Mere) fables of the men of old.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:14: Nay, but that which they have earned is rust upon their hearts.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:15: Nay, but surely on that day they will be covered from (the mercy of) their Lord.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:16: Then lo! they verily will burn in hell,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:17: And it will be said (unto them): This is that which ye used to deny.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:18: Nay, but the record of the righteous is in ’Illiyin -
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:19: Ah, what will convey unto thee what ’Illiyin is! -
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:21: Attested by those who are brought near (unto their Lord).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:22: Lo! the righteous verily are in delight,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:24: Thou wilt know in their faces the radiance of delight.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:25: They are given to drink of a pure wine, sealed,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:26: Whose seal is musk - for this let (all) those strive who strive for bliss -
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:27: And mixed with water of Tasnim,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:28: A spring whence those brought near (to Allah) drink.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:29: Lo! the guilty used to laugh at those who believed,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:30: And wink one to another when they passed them;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:31: And when they returned to their own folk, they returned jesting;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:32: And when they saw them they said: Lo! these have gone astray.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:33: Yet they were not sent as guardians over them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:34: This day it is those who believe who have the laugh of disbelievers,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 83:36: Are not the disbelievers paid for what they used to do ? gazing.

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:1: Woe to those that deal in fraud,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:2: Those who, when they have to receive by measure from men, exact full measure,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:3: But when they have to give by measure or weight to men, give less than due.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:4: Do they not think that they will be called to account?-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:6: A Day when (all) mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:7: Day! Surely the record of the wicked is (preserved) in Sijjin.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:8: And what will explain to thee what Sijjin is?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:10: Woe, that Day, to those that deny-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:11: Those that deny the Day of Judgment.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:12: And none can deny it but the Transgressor beyond bounds the Sinner!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:13: When Our Signs are rehearsed to him, he says, "Tales of the ancients!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:14: By no means! but on their hearts is the stain of the (ill) which they do!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:15: Verily, from (the Light of) their Lord, that Day, will they be veiled.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:16: Further, they will enter the Fire of Hell.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:17: Further, it will be said to them: "This is the (reality) which ye rejected as false!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:18: Day, verily the record of the Righteous is (preserved) in ’Illiyin.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:19: And what will explain to thee what ’Illiyun is?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:21: To which bear witness those Nearest (to God).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:22: Truly the Righteous will be in Bliss:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:23: On Thrones (of Dignity) will they command a sight (of all things):
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:24: Thou wilt recognise in their faces the beaming brightness of Bliss.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:25: Their thirst will be slaked with Pure Wine sealed:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:26: The seal thereof will be Musk: And for this let those aspire, who have aspirations:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:27: With it will be (given) a mixture of Tasnim:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:28: A spring, from (the waters) whereof drink those Nearest to God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:29: Those in sin used to laugh at those who believed,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:30: And whenever they passed by them, used to wink at each other (in mockery);
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:31: And when they returned to their own people, they would return jesting;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:32: And whenever they saw them, they would say, "Behold! These are the people truly astray!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:33: But they had not been sent as keepers over them!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:34: But on this Day the Believers will laugh at the Unbelievers:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:35: On Thrones (of Dignity) they will command (a sight) (of all things).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 83:36: Will not the Unbelievers have been paid back for what they did?

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:2: when they measure against the people, take full measure
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:3: but, when they measure for them or weigh for them, do skimp.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:4: Do those not think that they shall be raised up
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:6: a day when mankind shall stand before the Lord of all Being?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:7: No indeed; the Book of the libertines is in Sijjin;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:8: and what shall teach thee what is Sijjin?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:10: Woe that day unto those who cry it lies,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:11: who cry lies to the Day of Doom;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:12: and none cries lies to it but every guilty aggressor.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:13: When our signs are recited to him, he says, ’Fairy-tales of the ancients!’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:14: No indeed; but that they were earning has rusted upon their hearts.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:15: No indeed; but upon that day they shall be veiled from their Lord,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:16: then they shall roast in Hell.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:17: Then it shall be said to them, ’This is that you cried lies to.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:18: No indeed; the book of the pious is in Illiyun;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:19: and what shall teach thee what is Illiyun?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:22: Surely the pious shall be in bliss,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:24: thou knowest in their faces the radiancy of bliss
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:25: as they are given to drink of a wine sealed
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:26: whose seal is musk -- so after that let the strivers strive --
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:28: a fountain at which do drink those brought nigh.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:29: Behold, the sinners were laughing at the believers,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:30: when them passed them by winking at one another,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:31: and when they returned to their people they returned blithely,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:32: and when they saw them they said, ’Lo, these men are astray!’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:33: Yet they were not sent as watchers over them.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:34: So today the believers are laughing at the unbelievers,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 83:36: Have the unbelievers been rewarded what they were doing? gazing.

Muhammad Asad.verse 83:1: WOE UNTO THOSE who give short measure:
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:2: those who, when they are to receive their due from
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:3: people, demand that it be given in full –
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:4: but when they have to measure or weigh whatever they owe to others, give less than what is due!
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:5: Do they not know that they are bound to be raised from the dead
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:6: [and called to account] on an awesome Day –
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:7: the Day when all men shall stand before the Sustainer of all the worlds?
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:8: NAY, VERILY, the record of the wicked is indeed [set down] in a mode inescapable!
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:9: And what could make thee conceive what that mode inescapable will be?
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:12: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth –
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:13: those who give the lie to the [coming of] Judgment Day:
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:14: for none gives the lie to it but such as are wont to transgress against all that is right [and are] immersed in sin:
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:15: [and so,] whenever Our messages are conveyed to them, they but say, "Fables of ancient times!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:16: Nay, but their hearts are corroded by all [the evil] that they were wont to do!
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:17: Nay, verily, from [the grace of] their Sustainer shall they on that Day be debarred;
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:18: and then, behold, they shall enter the blazing fire
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:19: and be told: "This is the [very thing] to which you were wont to give the lie!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:20: NAY, VERILY, the record of the truly virtuous is [set down] in a mode most lofty!
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:21: And what could make thee conceive what that mode most lofty will be?
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:26: Behold, [in the life to come] the truly virtuous will indeed be in bliss:
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:28: on couches, they will look up [to God]:
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:29: upon their faces thou wilt see the brightness of bliss.
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:30: They will be given a drink of pure wine whereon the seal [of God] will have been set,
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:31: pouring forth with a fragrance of musk.
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:32: for it is composed of all that is most exalting –
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:33: a source [of bliss] whereof those who are drawn close unto God shall drink.
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:34: BEHOLD, those who have abandoned themselves to sin are wont to laugh at such as have attained to faith;
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:35: and whenever they pass by them, they wink at one another ;
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:36: and whenever they return to people of their own kind, they return full of jests;
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:37: and whenever they see those [who believe,] they say, "Behold, these
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:39: And, withal, they have no call to watch over [the beliefs of] others.
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:40: But on the Day [of Judgment], they who had attained to faith will [be able to] laugh at the
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:42: [for, resting in paradise] on couches, they will look on [and say to themselves]:
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:43: "Are these deniers of the truth being
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:44: requited for [aught but] what they were wont to do?"
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:45: was [or “became”] high” or “lofty” or – tropically – “exalted”: thus in the well-known idiomatic phrase, huwa min ‘illiyyat qawmihi, “he is among the
Muhammad Asad.verse 83:48: lofty” – points, rather, to the effect which the “wine” of divine knowledge will have on those who “drink” of it in paradise.

Martin Lings.verse 83:3: Nay, but their earnings are even as rust over their hearts.
Martin Lings.verse 83:6: They are given to drink of a pure wine sealed.
Martin Lings.verse 83:7: Whose seal is musk – for this let the strivers strive.
Martin Lings.verse 83:8: And its flavour cometh from Tasnim.
Martin Lings.verse 83:9: A fountain whence drink they that are brought nigh.

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:2: who, when they measure something to receive from people, take it in full,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:3: and when they measure or weigh something to give it to them, give less than due.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:4: Do they not think that they have to be raised up
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:6: the Day when all the people will stand before the Lord of the worlds?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:8: And what may let you know what Sijjīn is?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:10: Woe that day to the deniers,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:11: who deny the Day of Requital!
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:12: And none denies it but every sinful transgressor.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:13: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, “(These are) tales of the ancients.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:14: No! But that which they used to commit has covered their hearts with rust.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:15: No! Indeed they will be screened off from their Lord on that Day.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:16: Then they will have to enter the Hell.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:17: Then it will be said, “This is what you used to deny.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:18: No! The record of deeds of the righteous is in ‘Illiyyūn .
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:19: And what may let you know what ‘Illiyyūn is ?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:21: attended by those (angels) who are blessed with nearness to Allah!
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:22: Indeed the righteous will be in absolute bliss.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:23: While (sitting) on thrones they will be watching (the scenes of Paradise).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:24: You will recognize the glamour of bliss on their faces.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:25: They will be served with a pure sealed wine to drink,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:26: the seal of which will be of musk.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:27: -and it will be blended with (a drink from) Tasnīm ,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:28: a spring from which will drink those who are blessed with nearness.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:29: Indeed those who were guilty used to laugh at those who believed,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:30: and when they passed by them, they used to wink at one another,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:31: and when they went back to their family, they went enjoying their mockery,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:32: and when they saw them, they said, “Surely these are the ones who have gone astray”
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:33: while they were not sent as watchmen over them.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:34: So, today those who believed will laugh at the disbelievers.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:35: While (sitting) on thrones, they will be seeing
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 83:36: whether the disbelievers have been paid back for what they used to do.

Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:17: When Our signs are recited to him, he says, ‘
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:19: No indeed! Rather there has slayed their hearts that which they earned.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:20: Nay! They, on that day will be screened off from their Lord.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:21: Then they will be exposed to Hell-fire,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:22: then it will be said: ‘This is that which you used to deny!’
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:23: Nay! The record of the pious is in ‘Illiyyūn;
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:24: and what will tell you, what ‘Illiyyūn is?,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:27: Assuredly the pious will be amid bliss,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:29: You will perceive in their faces the radiancy of bliss,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:30: as they are given to drink a nectar [that is] sealed,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:31: whose seal is musk — so for such
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:33: and whose mixture is of Tasnīm:
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:34: a spring from which those brought near will drink.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:35: Verily the guilty used to laugh at the believers;
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:36: and when they passed them by, they would wink at one another;
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:37: and when they returned to their folks they would return blithely;
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:38: and when they see them, they say, ‘Lo! these
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:40: Yet they were not sent as watchers over them.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:41: So today the believers will be laughing at the disbelievers,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 83:43: Have the disbelievers been requited for what they used to do? gazing.

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:1: Woe to those who give less in measure or weight!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:2: When (they) take by measure from others, they take (from them) full.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:3: And when they (themselves) give by measure or weigh to others, they give them less.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:4: Do they not believe that they will be raised up (again after death),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:6: The Day when all mankind will stand before the Lord of all the worlds?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:7: It is true that the record of the evildoers is kept in Sijjin (the ante-chamber of Hell).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:8: And what do you know what Sijjin is?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:9: It is an inscribed book (set down in the large ante-chamber of the prison of Hell, with the names and evil deeds of every inmate of Hell registered in it).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:10: Woe to the deniers on that Day,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:11: Those who deny the Day of Recompense!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:12: And no one else denies it except every defiant and sinner.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:13: When Our Revelations are read out to him, he says (or thinks) that (they are) tales of the ancients.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:14: That is not at all (the case); rather (the fact is that the evil deeds) which they earned have rusted their hearts.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:15: The truth is that they will be screened off (to deprive them of) the sight of their Lord.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:16: Then they will be cast into Hell.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:17: Then it will be said to them: ‘This is (the punishment of Hell) which you used to belie.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:18: This is (also) true that the record of the truly pious is for sure maintained in ‘Illiyyin (the ante-chamber of Paradise).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:19: And what do you know what ‘Illiyyin is?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:20: It is an inscribed book (set down in the large ante-chamber of a lofty mansion of Paradise with the names and pious deeds of those who will be allocated superior stations in Paradise).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:21: The angels closest (to Allah) remain present here.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:22: Indeed, the truly pious, (joyful and glad,) will be in blissful Paradise,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:23: Reclining on couches, enjoying the wonderful sights.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:24: You will find on their faces the glow and freshness of bliss and delight.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:25: They shall be served with securely sealed delicious and holy beverage.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:27: And this (beverage of Paradise) will be mixed with the water of Tasnim.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:28: (This Tasnim) is a fountain at which only those drawn close will drink.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:29: Surely (in the worldly life), the evildoers used to ridicule the believers,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:30: And winked at one another when they passed by them.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:31: And when they went back to their families, they used to exult over the believers (by comparing the believers’ destitution and their own affluence) and returned speaking of them with jests.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:32: And when they (the arrogant people) saw these (the indigent believers), they used to say: ‘They have gone astray,’ (i.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:33: Yet they had not been sent to watch over their (state of affairs).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:34: So (see) Today the believers are laughing at the disbelievers.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:35: Reclining on ornamented couches, they are viewing the sight (comparing their own prosperity and the disbelievers’ impoverishment).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 83:36: So, have the disbelievers been rewarded in full for (the mockery), which they used to inflict upon (the believers)? impoverishment).

null.verse 83:1: Voi väärintekijöitä mitattaessa tai punnittaessa
null.verse 83:2: jotka vaativat täyden mitan, kun mittaavat toisilta omaksi hyväkseen,
null.verse 83:3: mutta antavat vajaan mitan, kun mittaavat tai punnitsevat muille!
null.verse 83:4: Eivätkö nämä ihmiset usko, että heidät herätetään kuolleista
null.verse 83:6: päivänä, jona ihmisten on seistävä maailmojen Herran edessä?
null.verse 83:7: Ei! Totisesti on jumalattomien nimiluettelo Sidzinissä.
null.verse 83:8: Mutta tiedätkö, mikä Sidzin on?
null.verse 83:10: Voi sinä päivänä niitä, jotka hylkivät totuutta,
null.verse 83:11: niitä, jotka pitävät valheena Tuomion päivää!
null.verse 83:12: Mutta valheena sitä pitää vain julkea syntinen,
null.verse 83:13: joka sanoo, kun ilmoituksemme julistetaan hänelle: »Vanhojen taruja.
null.verse 83:14: Totisesti ei! Heidän tekonsa ovat kuin ruoste tärvelleet heidän sydämensä.
null.verse 83:15: Totisesti ei heitä päästetä Herransa luokse sinä päivänä,
null.verse 83:16: vaan he saavat astua helvetin ahjoon.
null.verse 83:17: Silloin sanotaan: »Tämä on se, jota te olemattomaksi väititte.
null.verse 83:18: Mutta hurskaitten nimiluettelo on Illijunissa.
null.verse 83:19: Tiedätkö, mikä Illijun on?
null.verse 83:21: Jumalan valiojoukko sen todistaa.
null.verse 83:22: Totisesti saavat hurskaat elää autuudessa,
null.verse 83:23: katsellen ympärilleen lepokorokkeiltaan.
null.verse 83:24: Sinä olet näkevä autuuden kirkkauden heidän kasvoillaan.
null.verse 83:25: He saavat nauttia puhdasta, muilta sinetöityä juomaa,
null.verse 83:26: jonka sinetti on myskiä - tätä juomaa kaikki kaivaten kaivatkoot -
null.verse 83:27: tämä sekoitus tulee ylhäältä,
null.verse 83:28: lähteestä, josta Jumalaa lähelle pääsevät juovat.
null.verse 83:29: Totisesti syntiset nauroivat uskovaisia,
null.verse 83:30: kun he kulkivat näiden ohi, iskivät he toisilleen silmää;
null.verse 83:31: palatessaan omiensa luo he olivat tyytyväisiä
null.verse 83:32: ja heidät nähdessään he sanoivat: »Totisesti nuo ovat harhateillä.
null.verse 83:33: Mutta totisesti emme Me lähettänyt tuommoisia heidän kaitsijoikseen,
null.verse 83:34: ja sinä päivänä saavat ne, jotka uskoivat, nauraa epäuskoisille
null.verse 83:35: ja katsella ylhäisiltä lepokorokkeilta ympärilleen.
null.verse 83:36: Mutta epäuskoiset saavat totisesti tekojensa palkan.

Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:2: Ceux qui, lorsqu'ils se font servir par d'autres, exigent une pleine mesure,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:3: et lorsqu'ils mesurent ou pèsent pour d'autres, leur causent une perte.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:4: Ces gens ne pensent-ils pas qu'ils seront ressuscités
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:6: le Jour où les hommes se tiendront debout devant le Seigneur des mondes ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:7: Que non ! Certes, le Livre des libertins est dans Sijjîn ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:8: mais qu'est-ce qui te fera connaître ce qu'est Sijjîn ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:9: C'est un registre tenu avec soin.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:10: Malheur, ce jour-là, à ceux qui crient au mensonge,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:11: ceux qui traitent de mensonge le Jour du Jugement :
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:12: seul un transgresseur, un pécheur invétéré le traite de mensonge !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:13: Quand on lui récite Nos versets, il s'écrie : " Fables d'anciens ! "
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:14: Que non ! Mais leurs cœurs ont été endurcis par leurs propres œuvres.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:15: Que non ! Ils seront, ce Jour-là, séparés de leur Seigneur par un voile,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:16: puis ils brûleront dans la Fournaise.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:17: On leur dira alors : " C'est là ce que vous traitiez de mensonge ! "
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:18: Que non ! Certes, le Livre des justes est dans Illiyoun ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:19: mais qu'est-ce qui te fera connaître ce qu'est Illiyoun ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:20: C'est un registre tenu avec soin.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:21: Ceux qui sont proches de Dieu le contemplent.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:22: Certes, les justes sont placés dans un lieu de délice ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:23: étendus sur des lits d'apparat, ils regardent.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:24: Tu reconnais sur leurs visages l'éclat de la béatitude.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:25: On leur sert à boire un nectar scellé
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:27: Il est mélangé à l'eau de Tasnîm,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:28: une fontaine où s'abreuvent ceux qui sont proches de Dieu.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:29: De vrai, les criminels riaient de ceux qui croient ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:30: lorsqu'ils passaient près d'eux, ils échangeaient des clins d'œil,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:31: et ils rentraient dans leur famille en plaisantant.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:32: Ils disaient en les regardant : " Ce sont là des égarés ! "
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:33: Pourtant, on ne les a pas envoyés pour être leurs gardiens.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:34: Mais aujourd'hui ce sont les croyants qui rient des mécréants :
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:35: couchés sur des lits d'apparat, ils regardent.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 83:36: Les mécréants ont-ils été rétribués pour leurs actions ?

Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:2: qui, lorsqu’ils font mesurer pour eux-mêmes exigent la pleine mesure,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:3: et qui lorsqu’eux-mêmes mesurent ou pèsent pour les autres,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:5: Ceux-là ne pensent-ils pas qu’ils seront ressuscités,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:7: le jour où les gens se tiendront debout devant le Seigneur de l’Univers ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:9: et qui te dira ce qu’est le Sijjin ? -
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:12: qui démentent le jour de la Rétribution.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:13: Or, ne le dément que tout transgresseur, pécheur :
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:14: qui, lorsque Nos versets lui sont récités, dit : «[Ce sont] des contes d’anciens ! »
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:15: Pas du tout, mais ce qu’ils ont accompli couvre leurs coeurs .
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:16: Qu’ils prennent garde ! En vérité ce jour-là un voile les empêchera de voir leur Seigneur,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:17: ensuite, ils brûleront certes, dans la Fournaise;
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:19: dira alors : «Voilà ce que vous traitiez de mensonge ! »
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:20: Qu’ils prennent garde ! Le livre des bons sera dans l’Illiyoun -
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:21: et qui te dira ce qu’est l’Illiyoun ? -
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:23: Les rapprochés (de Dieu : les Anges) en témoignent.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:24: Les bons seront dans [un jardin] de délice,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:26: Tu reconnaîtras sur leurs visages, l’éclat de la félicité.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:27: On leur sert à boire un nectar pur, cacheté,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:29: Il est mélangé à la boisson de Tasnim ,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:31: Les criminels riaient de ceux qui croyaient,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:32: et, passant près d’eux, ils se faisaient des oeillades,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:33: et, retournant dans leurs familles, ils retournaient en plaisantant,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:34: et les voyant, ils disaient : «Ce sont vraiment ceux-là les égarés».
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:35: Or, ils n’ont pas été envoyés pour être leurs gardiens.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:36: Aujourd’hui, donc, ce sont ceux qui ont cru qui rient des infidèles
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 83:38: Est-ce que les infidèles ont eu la récompense de ce qu’ils faisaient ? regardent.

null.verse 83:1: Wehe den kurzes Maß Gebenden!
null.verse 83:2: Die, wenn sie sich von den Leuten zumessen lassen, volles Maß verlangen;
null.verse 83:3: Wenn sie ihnen jedoch ausmessen oder auswägen, dann verkürzen sie es.
null.verse 83:4: Wissen solche nicht, daß sie auferweckt werden sollen
null.verse 83:6: Dem Tag, da die Menschheit vor dem Herrn der Welten stehen wird?
null.verse 83:7: Nein! das (Sünden-)Verzeichnis der Frevler ist in Sidschín.
null.verse 83:8: Und was lehrt dich wissen, was Sidschín ist? -
null.verse 83:10: Wehe an jenem Tage den Leugnern!
null.verse 83:11: Die den Tag des Gerichts leugnen.
null.verse 83:12: Und es leugnet ihn keiner als ein jeder sündhafter Übertreter,
null.verse 83:13: (Der) wenn ihm Unsere Zeichen vorgetragen werden, spricht: «Fabeln der Alten!»
null.verse 83:14: Nein, jedoch das, was sie zu wirken pflegten, hat auf ihre Hetzen Rost gelegt.
null.verse 83:15: Nein, sie werden an jenem Tage gewiß von ihrem Herrn getrennt sein.
null.verse 83:16: Dann werden sie fürwahr in die Hölle eingehen.
null.verse 83:17: Und es wird gesprochen werden: «Dies ist's, was ihr zu leugnen pflegtet!»
null.verse 83:18: Nein! das Verzeichnis der Rechtschaffenen ist gewißlich in Ìllijun.
null.verse 83:19: Und was lehrt dich wissen, was Ìllijun ist?
null.verse 83:21: Die Erwählten (Gottes) werden es schauen.
null.verse 83:22: Wahrlich, die Tugendhaften werden in Wonne sein.
null.verse 83:23: Auf hohen Pfühlen werden sie zuschauen.
null.verse 83:24: Erkennen wirst du auf ihren Gesichtern den Glanz der Seligkeit.
null.verse 83:25: Ihnen wird gegeben ein reiner, versiegelter Trank,
null.verse 83:26: Dessen Siegel Moschus ist - und dies mögen die Begehrenden erstreben -,
null.verse 83:27: Und es wird ihm Tasním beigemischt sein:
null.verse 83:28: Ein Quell, aus dem die Erwählten trinken werden.
null.verse 83:29: Die Sünder pflegten über die zu lachen, die glaubten;
null.verse 83:30: Und wenn sie an ihnen vorübergingen, blinzelten sie einander zu;
null.verse 83:31: Und wenn sie zu den Ihren zurückkehrten, kehrten sie frohlockend zurück;
null.verse 83:32: Und wenn sie sie sahen, sprachen sie; «Das sind fürwahr die Irregegangenen!»
null.verse 83:33: Aber sie sind nicht als Wächter über sie gesandt.
null.verse 83:34: Heute drum sind es die Gläubigen, die über die Ungläubigen lachen werden.
null.verse 83:35: Auf hohen Pfühlen werden sie zuschauen.
null.verse 83:36: Wird den Ungläubigen nicht vergolten, was sie zu tun pflegten? zuschauen.
